name: Canon CarePAK Plus
author: Canoncare

sections.description:
Canon CarePAK offers accidental damage protection, coverage after the warranty ends, service direct with Canon and more!
video.
video.
video.

overview

Canon CarePAK PLUS AND CarePAK PRO offers protection from accidental damage such as drops, spills, power surges, and more, including normal wear and tear, beyond the standard warranty period. With a CarePAK, a damaged product will be repaired to good working condition or replaced with an equivalent product.
CarePAK is cost-effective and easy-to-use, providing additional years of service and support from the date the Canon product is purchased. Your customers will enjoy peace of mind for years to come knowing their new equipment is covered.
Canon CarePAK is powered by QuickCover®, a platform developed by After Inc., the leader in post-sale customer experience technology. Canon CarePAK and QuickCover® technology were created to enable merchants to offer service plans for a wide variety of Canon products including cameras, lenses, printers, camcorders, binoculars, and more. 

Account Setup

Start selling Canon CarePAK today! To begin you will first need to sign up for a QuickCover® account at https://signup.quickcover.me/join/canoncarepak. The QuickCover® software is free of charge, and so user-friendly that you can begin selling service plans in minutes. Upon establishing your account and adding your WooCommerce outlet in the QuickCover® admin console, you’ll be able to view pricing, enable the extension in your store and sync Canon CarePAK to your products. For every plan you sell, you capture the revenue upfront and we will bill you the merchant price weekly. Please refer to additional set-up content and full documentation here.
Terms & Conditions
For CarePAK PLUS.
For CarePAK PRO.

FEATURES

  • Better Customer Experience: All products serviced by Canon factory trained technicians using only genuine Canon parts.
  • Higher Attach Rates vs. 3rd Party: Customers prefer manufacturer plans vs. third party plans for higher quality with a simplified customer experience.
  • Higher Value Allows for Higher Selling Price: A wide range of benefits allow for a higher average selling price and increased revenue.
  • CarePAK Provides 51% Gross Margin: Capture incremental revenue with every CarePAK sold.
  • Canon Handles All Customer Inquiries: Hassle free service and support direct from Canon, so customers will never deal with a 3rd party.
sections.installation:
1. Unzip the download package
  2. Upload canoncarepackplus to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
A question that someone might have

An answer to that question.

What about foo bar?

Answer to foo bar dilemma.
